headline: AppLovin (APP) Rises Higher Than Market: Key Facts
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, AppLovin (APP) stood at $483, denoting a +2.09% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: AppLovin Stock Is a Buy, Analyst Says. Why Google’s ‘Project Genie’ Isn’t a Threat.
summary: Benchmark reiterates a Buy rating on AppLovin, arguing that Google DeepMind’s new AI game-creation tool could ultimately benefit the company’s advertising and monetization business.

headline: Video game stocks: Morgan Stanley weighs impact of Google’s Genie 3
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley said Google’s launch of its Genie 3 world model has intensified fears of disruption across the video games industry, after shares in several major companies slumped following the announcement.

headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Slip As Uneven Factory Data Weighs
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Feb, 2 2026 US stock futures are pointing lower this morning, with E mini S&P 500 contracts down about 0.7% and Nasdaq 100 futures off just over 1%, as investors weigh softer global manufacturing data against signs of resilient demand. Several manufacturing scorecards, including Italy at 48.1 and Spain at 49.2, are still below 50, which signals factories are running cooler, while parts of Asia such as Japan at 51.5 are showing early signs of...
